description: This butterflied chicken recipe is perfect for feeding the family. It's marinated and served with a lip-smacking peri peri sauce. Try it today.
name: Peri Peri Barbecued Butterflied Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Masterfoods Portuguese chicken spice blend
1.3 kg Macro free range whole chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mayonnaise and remaining lemon juice in a large bowl. Season. Add coleslaw and parsley and toss to combine. Serve chicken with remaining peri peri sauce, coleslaw, lemon and bread.
